content: {"name": "Mt Hebron/Food for Life Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "ID is required.\nPlease bring a cart or shopping bags to carry your food.\ntheir schedule is up on facebook (https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61556164688129)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mt-hebron.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "905 Sutter Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "East New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11207", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6710112, "longitude": -73.88498299999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(347) 454-4915", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "ID preferred, but not required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
